autoRecall.label: Auto-recall at session start
autoRecall.help: Inject Working Memory briefing and relevant memories when a new session begins

autoCapture.label: Auto-capture at session end
autoCapture.help: Store high-value notes on agent_end / after_compaction / before_reset

maxRecallResults.label: Max recall results
maxRecallResults.help: How many memories to inject for each recall cycle (1–20)

apiUrl.label: Server URL (remote mode)
apiUrl.help: Leave empty for local mode (default: http://127.0.0.1:14242). Set to your remote server URL for cross-device or team access. See: https://docs.nowledge.co/docs/remote-access

apiKey.label: API key (remote mode)
apiKey.help: Required when connecting to a remote server. Never logged or passed as a CLI argument — injected as NMEM_API_KEY env var only.

autoRecall.description: Inject Working Memory and recalled memories at session start

autoCapture.description: Enable memory note capture across session lifecycle hooks

maxRecallResults.description: Maximum memories to recall at session start

apiUrl.description: Remote server URL. Empty = local (http://127.0.0.1:14242). Example: https://nowledge.example.com

apiKey.description: API key for remote access. Stored in plugin config, injected as NMEM_API_KEY env var — never logged.
